page.title: 02ECOLOGY OF THE LYTHE AREA
page.content: {ECOLOGY OF LYTHE {Botany:-}The area contains a wide variety of plant life-plants tolerating the bleak and salty conditions of the steep cliffs-plants that have taken over the disused railway track-plants of meadowland- plants of woodland and hedgerow together with various forms of fungi. Zoology:-Mammals such as rabbits,foxes,hedgehogs,weasels,stoats moles,badgers and deer can be seen. {Birds}of coastal regions as well as meadow and woodland can be observed. {Fish}such as cod,haddock,whiting,skate plaice ,dogfish and mackerel are found in the sea.Also crabs,lobsters and mussels.Sometimes seals and porpoises are seen. {Climate }Severe winters are tempered by the sea as are the cool summers.
